data.title: Quizzical
data.description: Quiz App made with React. Gets data from the OpenTDB API, and has functional testing with Mock Service Worker.

data.title: Pic Some
data.description: Front end only photo shopping cart app. Users can favorite and add photos to the shopping cart and check out.

data.title: Markdown Notes
data.description: Write, save, and preview notes in markdown. Made to start projects more complicated than a todo list.

data.title: Color Scheme Helper
data.description: A color scheme helper tool, get a 5 color palette in several scheme types. Uses the public 'thecolorapi'.

data.title: Airbnb Experiences Clone
data.description: A front end only single page Airbnb experiences clone made to recreate a design by looking at a page.

data.title: Movie Watchlist
data.description: Search for movies by title and save them in a watchlist for later. Uses the Open Movie Database API.
